mapper.insert: insert into meta_const_detail ( constDetailId, constId, detailName, detailValue, detailRemark, createDate, createBy, operateDate, operateBy, delSign, version) values ( #{constDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{constId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detailRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delSign,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update meta_const_detail set constId = #{constId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detailName = #{detailName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailValue = #{detailValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detailRemark = #{detailRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operateDate = #{operateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operateBy = #{operateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where constDetailId = #{constDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and version=#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} and delSign=0
mapper.delete: update meta_const_detail set delSign=1 where constDetailId = #{constDetailId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and delSign=0
